titleStmt.title: The dailie examination, and arraignment of sins gathered out of the most reverend the primate of Ireland's sermon at Lincolns Inn. Decemb. 3. 1648.
titleStmt.author: Ussher, James, 1581-1656.

notesStmt.note: Thomason received his copy in July 1652.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
